inclusion.criterion: CD4 cell count greater than or equal to 350 cells/mm(3)
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: HIV-1 RNA level by RT PCR less than or equal to 20,000 copies/ml
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: On stable HAART regimen for greater than or equal to 6 months with CD4 and viral load parameters as outlined in 2.1.1.4
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: Patients greater than or equal to 18 years willing to provide informed consent or parent/guardian willing to provide informed consent for minor children less than 18 years of age.
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: Any of the following hematologic abnormalities
exclusion.label: unknown
